item.description:
RELEASE INFO * Use archive factory as default when working with archives * Fix collection mods textbox incorrect position when dragging and dropping off screen * Ensure that prompts are brought into focus (if they already aren't) * Chinese localization update (thanks to Sciencmine)
CHANGES FROM v1.9: * Upgrade dependencies * Tweak basic conflict solver merge view * Add advanced merge "view" by allowing you to open diffs in external editor of your choice * Improve version sort * Clear selection upon mod sort * Fix mod compare sort scroll * Improved localization conflict detection and export (warning this is not backwards compatible and could reset a lot of resolved conflicts) * Allow ignore use to ignore partial definition name matches * Custom patches overriding existing mod files will be acknowledged by Irony and replaced during replacement phase and used instead of the source mod file
